GATHERHEADERDOC(1) General Commands Manual GATHERHEADERDOC(1)

NAME

gatherheaderdoc —
header documentation processor

SYNOPSIS

gatherheaderdoc [options] directory

DESCRIPTION

Gatherheaderdoc processes the headerdoc output in directory and creates an index page that links to each header's documentation.

FILES

/$HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.headerDoc2HTML.config
 

SEE ALSO

headerdoc2html(1)

For more information, see the HeaderDoc User Guide. It can be found in /Developer/Documentation/ if you have the Xcode Tools package installed, or at <http://developer.apple.com/documentation/DeveloperTools/Conceptual/HeaderDoc> in the reference library.

June 13, 2003 Darwin
